edu.cmu.sphinx.api

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.api.Context

  • public class Context
extends Object
    Helps to tweak configuration without touching XML-file directly.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Context(Configuration config)
      Constructs builder that uses default XML configuration.
      Context(String path, Configuration config)
      Constructs builder using user-supplied XML configuration.

        throws IOException,

        Constructs builder that uses default XML configuration.
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if failed to load configuration file

      • Context

        public Context(String path,
               Configuration config)
        throws IOException,
               MalformedURLException
        Constructs builder using user-supplied XML configuration.
        Parameters:
        path - path to XML-resource with configuration
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if failed to load configuration file
        IOException - if failed to load configuration file

    • Method Detail

      • setAcousticModel

        public void setAcousticModel(String path)
                      throws IOException
        Sets acoustic model location. It also reads feat.params which should be located at the root of acoustic model and sets corresponding parameters of MelFrequencyFilterBank2 instance.
        Parameters:
        path - path to directory with acoustic model files
        Throws:
        IOException - if failed to read feat.params

      • setDictionary

        public void setDictionary(String path)
        Sets dictionary.
        Parameters:
        path - path to directory with dictionary files

      • setSampleRate

        public void setSampleRate(int sampleRate)
        Sets sampleRate.
        Parameters:
        sampleRate - sample rate of the input stream.

      • setGrammar

        public void setGrammar(String path,
                       String name)
        Sets path to the grammar files. Enables static grammar and disables probabilistic language model. JSGF and GrXML formats are supported.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the grammar files
        name - name of the main grammar to use
        See Also:
        setLanguageModel(String)

      • setLanguageModel

        public void setLanguageModel(String path)
        Sets path to the language model. Enables probabilistic language model and disables static grammar. Currently it supports ".lm" and ".dmp" file formats.
        Parameters:
        path - path to the language model file
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if path ends with unsupported extension
        See Also:
        Context#setGrammar(String)

      • setSpeechSource

        public void setSpeechSource(InputStream stream,
                            TimeFrame timeFrame)

      • setSpeechSource

        public void setSpeechSource(InputStream stream)
        Sets byte stream as the speech source.
        Parameters:
        stream - stream
        See Also:
        Context#useMicrophone()

      • processBatch

        public void processBatch()
        Sets batch frontend to process whole file.
        See Also:
        Context#setSpeechSource(URL)

      • setLocalProperty

        public void setLocalProperty(String name,
                             Object value)
        Sets property within a "component" tag in configuration. Use this method to alter "value" property of a "property" tag inside a "component" tag of the XML configuration.
        Parameters:
        name - property name
        value - property value
        See Also:
        setGlobalProperty(String, Object)

      • setGlobalProperty

        public void setGlobalProperty(String name,
                              Object value)
        Sets property of a top-level "property" tag. Use this method to alter "value" property of a "property" tag whose parent is the root tag "config" of the XML configuration.
        Parameters:
        name - property name
        value - property value
        See Also:
        setLocalProperty(String, Object)

      • getInstance

        public <C extends Configurable> C getInstance(Class<C> clazz)
        Returns instance of the XML configuration by its class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - class to look up
        Returns:
        instance of the specified class or null

      • getLoader

        public Loader getLoader()
        Returns the Loader object used for loading the acoustic model.
        Returns:
        the loader object
